game.phase.condition.except{0}: List of Phases (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Before Battle, Range Attacks, Block'
game.phase.condition.if{0}: List of Phases (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Before Battle, Range Attacks, Block'
game.phase.condition.list{0}: List of Phases (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Before Battle, Range Attacks, Block'
game.time.condition.except{0}: List of Time conditions (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Day, Night'
game.time.condition.if{0}: List of Time conditions (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Day, Night'
game.time.condition.list{0}: List of Time conditions (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Day, Night'
locale.en.name: Name of this Language to show to the user
